answers.answer: Hi,this could be something completely unrelated to the diabetes and should be mentioned to her pediatrician.However, have you tested her blood sugar when she's feeling bad?  If it's normal when she's having the symptoms, it may be due to something else.Definitely worth get checked out though.

question: my 12 yr old daughter has type 1 diabetes for 18 mnths with good control and excellent hbac1 results. for the past couple of weeks she has abdominal pain and slight headache however no ketones why is this happening
title: worried mum
